file_content.text: Our troops will soon be operating at peak efficiency.
Wonderful! You recovered the pirates' adrenal secretors. I'll start production immediately.
You deserve bonus. I give adrenal dose? I know you already had, but one more might not kill you.
Dose coming. If live, enjoy kill spree.
You right. Better safe. Take reward. All good.
You make Empire strong on Hoth. You great champion.
You kill pirates, get adrenal secretor and containment cube, bring to me.
Hey. You don't want to be at a disadvantage out there, do you? Cold like that can steal your strength, slow your mind.
The key to victory on Hoth is weathering the frigid weather. Whoever does that will win in the long run.
Unfortunately, the pirates have us beat there. It's been a huge drain on us to compete. But maybe you can change that.
Tell me how.
Indeed. The pirates use a new adrenal secretor that delivers a steady time-release supply. Years ahead of our clunky injectors.
Sounds like a sales pitch.
Er, no. The pirates are using a new adrenal secretor. Delivers a steady time-release supply, much more efficient than our own models.
Don't bother us.
Don't bother me.
Not interested in anything your kind has to say.
But the pirates have a new adrenal secretor, years ahead of our outdated injectors.
Doesn't help that the Empire's adrenals have a sixty-seven percent failure rate. We can't compete with the pirates.
But if you can get your hands on their secretors, I can replicate the technology. Level the killing field, so to speak.
What's involved?
You want to know what you'll face. Understandable.
I'm going to need credits.
The Empire has offered me a healthy commission. I'd be happy to give you a cut.
I can't be bested by some pirates, adrenalized or otherwise.
Already level for me.
I'm sure. But not everyone has your endurance. Compromises have had to be made.
Some pirates in field with secretor now. Kill enough, you find one. Also, find intact containment cube to transport. Or it spent before I get.
Something easy for a change.
Much appreciated.
I'll consider it.
It'll be worth your while. Promise.
Also, this you know. When you get secretor, adrenals kick in, you feel real good. Kill twice as fast. But too much, kill you.
I'll start prepping the lab now. Good luck.
I'll pass. [Refuse quest]
I said "no." [Refuse quest]
Fine. Sorry to waste your time.
I don't want any trouble.
You deserve a bonus. Perhaps a dose of the adrenal? Great when you need a pick-me-up.
Kill the pirates, get their adrenal secretors, and bring them back to me. Please.
There are pirates out in the field now. You find any, kill them and steal their secretors. They won't miss them.
